title: ...and yet again Evelynn has been put into oblivion
body: Thanks for all the nerfs and making the viable champion pool yet again smaller.

replies.body: yea, and rengar can keep his 2,3k dmg within 0,46sec - but if eve is somewhat viable she instantly gets shut down, despite offering no (hard) cc or any real tankiness.

Eve's damage isn't gated by CDs. Her ulti isn't needed to kill, only the E and Q, hence why she's impossible to control power-wise. When she's viable, she's doing WAY too much damage... because she has no CC no tanky stats, so she's mobility and damage, like a normal Assassin. She lacks an actual gap closer though, which means she needs to have MORE damage that way she can have something higher than the usual Assassin, but because of the stealth, if she has huge damage, she gets to do it before you see it coming, which lacks counterplay, etc. It's poor design.

> [{quoted}](name=Zair Umbras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-08-02T18:41:18.334+0000)
>
>but because of the stealth, if she has huge damage, she gets to do it before you see it coming, which lacks counterplay, etc. It's poor design.

eve cannot hit you withou being seen first

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2015-08-02T23:37:00.154+0000)
>
> eve cannot hit you withou being seen first

{{summoner:4}}

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T00:56:00.942+0000)
>
> {{summoner:4}}

That is a retarded statement.
Why?
You can flash over walls where you aren't seen.
I suppose by your statement flash needs to be nerfed.

Seriously...Evelynn's stealth stops working the moment she enters <700 range of her target.
Her only way of hitting you s her ult which is 650 range.
You will ALWAYS see her before she does anything.
If you are complaining about Evelynn's offensive stealth ability, you're very ignorant.

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=00050001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T01:30:44.745+0000)
>
> That is a retarded statement.
> Why?
> You can flash over walls where you aren't seen.
> I suppose by your statement flash needs to be nerfed.
> 
> Seriously...Evelynn's stealth stops working the moment she enters <700 range of her target.
> Her only way of hitting you s her ult which is 650 range.
> You will ALWAYS see her before she does anything.
> If you are complaining about Evelynn's offensive stealth ability, you're very ignorant.

Yes, the d1 main, who has a 70+% win rate with eve in all elo's below diamond is ignorant of what makes eve overly strong. I can hide in a bush and kill you from fog of war 1 shot style like any other champ. I can use any of a number of tricks to LITERALLY not be seen until I am right on top of you. This is why im d1, and why I have a 70+% win rate on eve. I'm ignorant. And yes, I can flash from invis distance and be in range to 1 shot you. Ravage has a range, check it, my q has a range, check it. My ult has a range, you listed it so I LITERALLY can OBVIOUSLY flash into ult range from invis and 1 shot you. 

Diamond 1. No backtalk.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T02:02:20.872+0000)
>
> **. I can hide in a bush and kill you from fog of war 1 shot style like any other champ.** 

This one statement is acknowledgement that your argument was bad and is refuted.
Many champions can flash from 700 range, from fog of war where they cannot be seen and kill a squishy instantly.
Rengar can do it.
Kha'zix can do it.
Malzahar can do it.
Annie can do it.
Syndra can do it.

Bringing up Flash, as an argument for Eve's passive being strong, is entirely misleading because it can be done by almost every single champ.

Evelynn flashes into range, she is now seen. She does not have true stealth like Twitch or Rengar.
Rengar pops his ultimate, they get a notification but he is unseen by anything except true sight.
Rengar leaps from 725 range, he doesn't need flash even if his stealth had the same 700 range as Evelynn.

Evelynn being able to flash in on a target says NOTHING about her stealth.
Yes, you're ignorant.
You can be the best gamer for MvC2, USF4, SSBM, and you can still say something ignorant.

Congrats on being Diamond, doesn't stop you from staying stupid things.
Like bringing up your rank as a way of defending your statement.

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T03:43:42.390+0000)
>

> Rengar leaps from 725 range, he doesn't need flash even if his stealth had the same 700 range as Evelynn.
>

> Yes, you're ignorant.
> You can be the best gamer for MvC2, USF4, SSBM, and you can still say something ignorant.
> 
> Congrats on being Diamond, doesn't stop you from staying stupid things.
> Like bringing up your rank as a way of defending your statement.

Bronze 3 tells diamond 1 the diamond 1 is ignorant twice. Sigh. Stay bronze for life. Nub.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=00050001000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-03T06:36:34.708+0000)
>
> Bronze 3 tells diamond 1 the diamond 1 is ignorant twice. Sigh. Stay bronze for life. Nub.

Bronze 3 has won over 2 grand from a video game, Diamond I only has his left over babies on his hand as a souvenir.

*slow claps*

If we go by your logic, I suppose I have more weight in discussing game balance since I've succeeded in an environment where the only thing that matters is winning.

>
> Well, here's the thing:
> 
> You don't see Eve coming into the fight until that 700 range point. She gains cc from Ryali's in ways that Kha'zix and Rengar can't...or at least shouldn't...copy. She doesn't HAVE to use Flash to initiate like Annie or Malzahar do because she has a strong movement speed steroid she can use while you can't see her, thus she can fly into combat before you can react and use her Hate Spike and ult to stick to you while gaining a shield while already being built tanky. Lastly, who the fk cares about Syndra Flash plays? What next, Brand?

Well here is the thing, you don't see it with many othre champions either.
The entire point of my argument is simple.
If Flash is the primary reason an individual believes Evelynn's stealth abilities are powerful offensively, the it is ignorant because of the fact that the mass majority of champions can replicate the exact same gameplay without stealth in the first place.

Evelynn can also be more easily escaped than Annie or Malzahar, since remember, the only CC she has is that of a slow.

> 
> The point is that if someone just HAS to be paranoid about Eve being spotted because for SOME reason they couldn't just start their engage out of that range with the movement buff, they can STILL use Flash to pull it off. Still, she doesn't really need it like some people do, and she's a strong user of Ryali's, unlike other stealth abusers, so getting away from her is actually nearly impossible without straight killing her or jumping over a wall at the last second, which you won't do if you're a squishy target.
> 
> Flash or not, permanent invisibility is strong.

Except again, it isn't true invisibility, she becomes visible the moment she enters the <700 range mark.
She literally cannot hit you until t least 650, and that is with her ult which she is forced to use nor does she have hard CC.
The reason other stealth users don't utilize Rylai's is simple, they are all AD and almost none of them need the usage of Frozen Mallet's slow.

Rengar jumps you from 725 range, beyond Evelynn's stealth range.
Twitch has true stealth and is ranged.
Kha'zix can leap over walls,  which Evelynn has to burn a summoner spell to utilize.

The issue is that Evelynn warrants a greater change in gameplay, and people don't like change.
So she won't ever be a good champion because asking people to alter the way they play is the same as assking them to pull a tooth out.
They won't do it.

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-08-03T13:39:56.949+0000)

> 
> The issue is that Evelynn warrants a greater change in gameplay, and people don't like change.
> So she won't ever be a good champion because asking people to alter the way they play is the same as assking them to pull a tooth out.
> They won't do it.

Ok, lemme break this down one last time:

We use wards to keep vision on things we have no eyes on, but Eve can easily bypass these wards. With this said, in any instance you go on the offense, unless Eve is behind, she can simply angle her counter-offense for free and fly in. She has a speed buff to catch you, so you won't out-run her. She can build to be a bruiser while building very little ap to do it, so the odds of killing her are low unless you get another bruiser on her or take her on with numbers. She's basically like how tank Ekko was...just more invisible with less utility. An assassin built like a bruiser always causes problems with the game's balance because assassins are supposed to be almost as squishy as adcs on paper. What's worse is that you can't really see her attack coming. Sure, some people have a tad more range. Sure, her longest ranged attack is 650. How are you gonna escape someone that's flying at you with a speed buff on when you only have 700 range to do it and they're cutting off your escape path? The point is practicality. Malz and Annie have to burn a highly valuable resource for their solo plays. Rengar has to use ult or be in a bush. Even can literally just walk around willy-nilly, aiming for the perfect angle to flank and murder you.

And a side note: Being forced to play passive all lane just because Eve exists is stupid. The only counter-play to her outside of hopefully starving her of early game kills is to buy a pink ward over and over. That doesn't even kill her...it only lets you know she's near the pink ward.

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-04T08:04:27.039+0000)
>
> Ok, lemme break this down one last time:
> 
> We use wards to keep vision on things we have no eyes on, but Eve can easily bypass these wards.

Ward her jungle camps.
This is what is done at high level of play to counter her stealth. 
If you cannot afford a pink, you throw a ward into her jungle at one of the camps.
Junglers tend to be weaker than laners due to the nature of gold and exp.
You can easily establish some vision through your first back, or through your jungler's capability.

>this said, in any instance you go on the offense, unless Eve is behind, she can simply angle her counter-offense for free and fly in. She has a speed buff to catch you, so you won't out-run her. She can build to be a bruiser while building very little ap to do it, so the odds of killing her are low unless you get another bruiser on her or take her on with numbers.

Evelynn builds bruiser because she is a squishy champion, not because she is naturally tanky.
It is why Evelynn has a rough time in her first/second clearing of the jungle. SHe doesn't get tanky until she has the items to do it unlike some champions such as Sion who has the natural base stats.

On top of this, yes she has a MS buff, but so does Udyr.
What is the counter for Udyr? Slows and roots and CC.
Evelynn is easily kited because her Hate spike's projectile decays in speed.
So at max range, simply running in a straight line can cause it to mis..


 >She's basically like how tank Ekko was...just more invisible with less utility. An assassin built like a bruiser always causes problems with the game's balance because assassins are supposed to be almost as squishy as adcs on paper.

Have you looked at her stats?
Evelynn IS squishy like an ADC.
The only reason she seems tankier is two things.
Her ult grants her a shield, her ULT, and she BUILDS tanky.
Otherwise, Evelynn dies very quickly and very easily like every other assassin.

It's like stating Zed is a bruiser because he built bruiser items.

 >What's worse is that you can't really see her attack coming. Sure, some people have a tad more range. Sure, her longest ranged attack is 650. How are you gonna escape someone that's flying at you with a speed buff on when you only have 700 range to do it and they're cutting off your escape path? The point is practicality. Malz and Annie have to burn a highly valuable resource for their solo plays. Rengar has to use ult or be in a bush. Even can literally just walk around willy-nilly, aiming for the perfect angle to flank and murder you.

The same argument can be made for a Reksai tunneling from behind your jungler' camps to knock you up with hard CC that you CANT cleanse.
Meanwhile, you're stating you have issues with someone with a MS boost (not a 650 gap closer liek sejuani or 725 liek Rengar).
Who you can see running at you and doesn't utilize a blink?

For evelynn to be successful at her ganks, she NEEDS her laner to be cooperative and bring hard CC otherwise, her ganks will fail because she has NO CC outsideof her ultimate.
This is why everyone goes chilling smite, without it, she has no CC to complete a gank and the chances of success are so small that there is no point.
Especially in a mobile heavy game where the most viable champs have a gap closer/CC to deter champs such as evelynn
Its why in the LCS, she is built as a support because she isn't a good tank, she isn't a good assassin.


> 
> And a side note: Being forced to play passive all lane just because Eve exists is stupid. The only counter-play to her outside of hopefully starving her of early game kills is to buy a pink ward over and over. That doesn't even kill her...it only lets you know she's near the pink ward.

Pardon but this can be said of any champion who turns a lane into a farm lane such as Malzahar and Heimerdinger.
Nerf them because they make you play passive all game.
Nerf Nasus because he makes the game passive.

Nerf everything that isn't your definition of fun and exciting.

> [{quoted}](name=Bears Dont Care,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T03:43:42.390+0000)

>

> Rengar leaps from 725 range, he doesn't need flash even if his stealth had the same 700 range as Evelynn.
>

> Yes, you're ignorant.
> You can be the best gamer for MvC2, USF4, SSBM, and you can still say something ignorant.
> 
> Congrats on being Diamond, doesn't stop you from staying stupid things.
> Like bringing up your rank as a way of defending your statement.

Well, here's the thing:

You don't see Eve coming into the fight until that 700 range point. She gains cc from Ryali's in ways that Kha'zix and Rengar can't...or at least shouldn't...copy. She doesn't HAVE to use Flash to initiate like Annie or Malzahar do because she has a strong movement speed steroid she can use while you can't see her, thus she can fly into combat before you can react and use her Hate Spike and ult to stick to you while gaining a shield while already being built tanky. Lastly, who the fk cares about Syndra Flash plays? What next, Brand?

The point is that if someone just HAS to be paranoid about Eve being spotted because for SOME reason they couldn't just start their engage out of that range with the movement buff, they can STILL use Flash to pull it off. Still, she doesn't really need it like some people do, and she's a strong user of Ryali's, unlike other stealth abusers, so getting away from her is actually nearly impossible without straight killing her or jumping over a wall at the last second, which you won't do if you're a squishy target.

Flash or not, permanent invisibility is strong.

Items is HARDLY a fair argument! And NOBODY builds Ryali's on Eve! Her Ult has a huge CD, and the "Is she near?" aspect is part of what makes her viable! Lastly, squishy targets are NEVER alone!; If they are, Who jumps them is irrelevant!

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T00:56:00.942+0000)

She can't get into flash range before she's revealed.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000010000,timestamp=2015-08-03T02:02:45.411+0000)
>
> Yes, I can. You maybe can't, I can.

OK fair enough, I underestimated the range on Ravage, but I wouldn't call Flash from stealth assassinations particularly comparable to stuff like Rengar leaps anyway, especially as Flashing into Ravage range without being spotted beforehand is very unforgiving, positioning-wise. I mean this is before you take into account the fact that she can Flash from stealth every 5 minutes at most anyway.

You can drop the attitude btw. If someone says something inaccurate you could try actually correcting them rather than telling them they must be mechanically incompetent and leaving them to look up the Wiki to see what you're talking about.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=0005000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T02:42:16.159+0000)

When the person in question called me, a diamond 1 player, ignorant I'm gonna be offended by that. I'm gonna get an attitude about it. I came here trying to clear up some misconceptions for you guys and I got chewed up for providing that service and dropping some knowledge. That's impolite in the upmost, and honestly, has no place on the boards. I didn't come here to berate low level players, I came here to help you guys and got insulted for doing so. Its no small wonder high elo players like myself often ignore this board and players in it asking for help. As a group yall don't listen and you insult us when we tell you that you are wrong. We don't do it to be mean to you... we do it to HELP you guys. Act respectful.

And yes, I know it wasn't you posting the insult, I'm just using "you" to describe the player base (no offense intended Mother, you've been pretty respectful) that can most often be found here. Eve is op as balls with rylai atm, that's a fact. Don't call her unviable.
https://24.media.tumblr.com/bea470b03882a7cc87465a506a580cec/tumblr_mzzakagP2N1s8hnhko1_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-03T21:42:32.730+0000)
>
> https://24.media.tumblr.com/bea470b03882a7cc87465a506a580cec/tumblr_mzzakagP2N1s8hnhko1_500.gif

Lol, thanks lace. Doesn't matter, I'm done trying to talk sense into people who lack any. They can stay bronze for life. Don't care, when I get insulted for trying to correct misconceptions that's it, these idiots can remain idiots if they want to. Its a choice to learn and improve and grow, those who want to choose to. Those who don't, stay bronze in game and in life. Enjoy being low elo scrubs low elo scrubs.

....

I'm low elo :(

> [{quoted}](name=LaceUp23,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=00050001000000000001000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T22:09:00.209+0000)
>
> ....
> 
> I'm low elo :(

Yeah, but you are also respectful of others when they try to drop some knowledge on you. You have hope, others clearly don't. Instead of being offended when some one tells you that you were wrong about something you think about it critically and weigh the merits of the statement. This means you can improve. There are plenty in this thread who will never amount to anything in game or in life because their minds are closed. That's sad. But its true.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000010000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T22:17:38.120+0000)
>
>There are plenty in this thread who will never amount to anything in game or in life

"But itz jus a gayme nuub" is my favorite response to this. My only problem is when people troll around in the game, intentionally ruining it for their 4 teammates and creating a negative environment, and don't get punished for it. Yet you can say, in exact words, "dude stop trolling please" and get punished for calling him a troll and "ruining his fun". What's worse is the community actually defends it. E-sports will never be respected as a real "sport?" with the mentality that they have. Literally any other sport I've played, you would get bitched at for trolling. The coach wouldn't defend the player that intentionally took the ball and scored the game winning touchdown for the other team lol.

Fuck pro, if you did that shit in highschool you would be off the team lol. I just don't get how people defend others that are intentionally trolling the game. They always say stupid shit like, "They just had a bad game". Like bullshit. You think I don't know the difference between having a bad game and running down mid lane with Lulu (5th pick mad that she didn't get mid) feeding kills to the enemy Zed? No, it's not having a bad game and missing a tackle. It's taking the ball and running into the other endzone with it. Then they saying stupid shit like, "this community is so toxic". Well no shit! When behavior like this is encouraged, obviously the community is going to be shitty. It's like people aren't smart enough to realize that the majority of "raging" comes as a result of people intentionally dicking them with no consequences. Rarely do I see some person just flaming away for no reason.

Sometimes I honestly wish I was stupid so that other people's stupidity didn't bug me.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=00050001000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T02:48:53.499+0000)

Generally related to the topic, I do agree that she's viable (really the stats simply do not suggest her being terrible right now, and I'm not just talking about winrate here), but even if she weren't that's no excuse for being impolite.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GBmfblap,comment-id=000500010000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T03:17:01.381+0000)

It happens, but it still sucks. I'm only here to help the less experienced, so I don't like being insulted when I try to do that, all it is really.

0.46 seconds? 

This is more accurate https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yW_st2H2Y2Y

that's fair in my opinion, rengar is an assassin which means he is meant to be really bursty like that. In this scenario talon is not a tank and rengar went all damage with a 2 level lead. if youre playing an ADC and you get obliterated in 2 seconds to a fed zed then the same effect happens
2 seconds? I think you mean 0.01.

Yeah but that doesn't happen early to mid game, usually only if rengar is fed or the game is really long. Rengar is more than manageable when he goes top, he has a bit more of an advantage in the jungle but so does any other stealth champ. Pink wards are something you should get when the jungle has stealth, just upgrading your trinket into pinks is enough to totally disrupt ganks from rengar.
Honestly i'm glad, she's pretty fucking annoying to deal with considering she negates normal wards and you can only buy 1 pink.
I can think of more annoying champions than her.
I really wish Riot knew how to balance stealth, because all they've proven is that they really, really can't :\

I know right!? :P

{{champion:28}} is one of my favorite champs, and her stealth has always felt the "fairest" to me. She's the only one you can see coming before your already being attacked, and it's not particularly useful for escaping... 5 seconds is a LONG time when your being chased by 3 enemy champs at 5% health! :P

As opposed to {{champion:35}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:121}}  and  {{champion:29}}, who I forgot to include earlier :P , who can use theirs offensively and defensively at the push of a button! Couldn't tell you how many times I've seen these guys dead to rights, then they suddenly disappear, and are either hopelessly far away, or in the case of Rango and Kaz, 1 second kill their attacker! ( BALANCE! :D  )

As for {{champion:17}}... Why he even has stealth is baffling! and its about to get a HUGE buff! Soon he'll only have to sit for 1.5 seconds, and it wont be broken by movement if he's in a bush!

I've posted on this board SEVERAL times that I'd like to see all stealth work like Eve's (Except {{champion:62}}'s b/c that would make his move worthless. :P ) And it always gets down-voted to oblivion! Shaco and Teemo mains I guess. :P

the reason you get downvoted is becasue all of these champions stealths arent permanent like eves is they have to use an actual ability to get their stealth and each one of them has quite a cooldown. and eves stealth is so stong early since the enemy cannot effectively ward against you like they could a rengar khazix or shaco

I already lodged my counter argument about this. Eve's stealh is still the only one that lets you see her BEFORE you've already taken damage. She also can not get it back on the fly if she gets in trouble. While she may be "un-wardable" early, She has no CC and is VERY squishy w/o her ult! Not the best pre 5 -6 ganker unless the enemy is REALLY pushed in!

They may be abilities w/ cool downs, but the difference is you get them EXACTLY when you want them ( so long as you don't make a dumb decision.) And unlike Eve they disappear w/o a trace! I've seen a {{champion:106}}  with a {{item:3068}}  sitting right on top of Teemo... and there was NOTHING he could do about it! And I already mentioned the issue with the others earlier.

I just think "permanent" stealth is a really terrible excuse for this Eve abuse!
Aside from Evelynn, the only champ's stealth that I like is Akali and that's because her W enables crazy jukes when played right.
Cause you said eve's was fair
Specifically, more fair then the complete invisibility the others get. :P

The real problem is that they are very short sighted in what they CAN balance around. They tend to focus in really hard on just one thing, say tanks, armor, stealth, etc. They sort of miss what nerfing or buffing these things impacts outside of just these things.

Same reason them just tossing in "cool" items ends up causing issues, like with devourer, cinderhulk, season 3 new black cleaver, warmogs when it was buffed, etc etc. They just focus on a single stat/group/play style, and tend to not think outside of it until that something directly starts impacting other somethings....then just nerf it and call it a day.
